description: A recent invention compared to other martinis, the Chocolate Martini was created by none other than the legendary film stars of Hollywood, Rock Hudson and Elizabeth Taylor, when they happened to come together during the making of the film “Giant” in Marfa, Texas.Both were great friends and lovers of&nbsp;chocolate drinks and&nbsp;martinis. One evening, they incidentally created the chocolate martini by mixing chocolate syrup and chocolate liqueur with&nbsp;vodka. The incredibly tasty drink attained high popularity in America.
name: Chocolate Martini

recipeInstructions.name: In a cocktail shaker with ice, combine vodka and chocolate liqueur.
recipeInstructions.text: In a cocktail shaker with ice, combine vodka and chocolate liqueur.

recipeInstructions.name: Shake vigorously for 15 seconds or until frost appears outside of the shaker.
